pages.text: $(bred)Squash Zombie$() is a Normal Zombie with Squash's head.$(br)$(bred)Health$() : $(l)25$()$(br)$(bred)Eat Damage$() : $(l)Low$()$(br)$(bblue)Speed$() : $(l)Very Fast$()$(br)$(l)Features$() : It will summon Squash to $(bred)crash its enemy$() which is close to and then die. When it's in water, it will wear a $(byellow)ducky tube$() to speed up.
